title: Targus XL Top-Loading Case Designed for 17-Inch Notebooks, Black (TXL417)
description: This Targus XL notebook case is ideal for transporting large-screen notebooks in a stylish, multifunction case. The XL notebook case also provides you with an easily accessible zip-down workstation, lockable zippers on the notebook compartment for added security, as well as a zippered pocket for a mobile phone. And as one of the world's lightest padded notebook cases, the Targus XL Notebook Case allows for effortless mobility.Features:Fits most larger notebooks with 17-inch screensOne of the world's lightest padded notebook casesZip-down workstation for business cards, media, pens, pencils, and moreIncludes 2 removable mesh accessory pouchesComfortable ergonomic handle and padded detachable shoulder strapLocking zipper pulls on the notebook compartmentNon-skid shock-absorbing rubber feetColor: blackDevice compatibility: notebooks measuring up to 16.5 x 2.2 x 12.9 inchesExterior dimensions: 18 x 6 x 15 inches (W x D x H)Material: nylonWarranty: limited lifetime warrantyWeight: 3.5 pounds
